bug.description:
I was trying to run decision tree model using the very simple Iris dataset and I found a possible bug: In trees/dt.py, line 160: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42528632/64308434-43590780-cf67-11e9-8c46-4aea55661882.png></denchmark-link>
The problem is when the array "levels" only has one element, the threshold will be empty, and it will crush on line 164 when we call "gain.max()". Please correct me if I'm wrong. Thank you for creating this useful repo!
